GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.30 to before v4.9.337
GSD.description:
macintosh: fix possible memory leak in macio_add_one_device()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit 3a866ff6fc2232c8e393cdb55ffb8ce947349e03, it was introduced in version v2.6.30 by commit 1fa5ae857bb14f6046205171d98506d8112dd74e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: macintosh: fix possible memory leak in macio_add_one_device()
